column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////There was NOTHING we could find wrong at Bavette's. The service was great
column2: our food & beverages were all phenomenal & the ambiance was comfortable. We visit steakhouses frequently for date night & we had to move Bavette's to our #1 spot after dining there! This place is a hit & we definitely will be back!! We absolutely fucking loved it!
